SummaryEnglish: The story takes place in Kyoto in the late 19th century. Manjiro has two faces. During the day, he works as a helper for people in Kyoto, but he also acts in secret to get back people's properties from the men in power. As the get-backer "Roman," Manjiro is getting involved in a nationwide conspiracy.

1.TitleEnglish: A Lavish Banquet of Raining Coins!
1.SummaryEnglish: With the help of his friends, Roman's lavish banquet will return money and power to the people!

2.TitleEnglish: A Lavish Banquet for That Hateful Jerk!
2.SummaryEnglish: Roman's latest robbery attempt has been stopped by a new member of the Mimawarigumi, Magoichi. Upset that he was bested by Magoichi, Roman has to hide it when Magoichi shows up at the Helper's.

3.TitleEnglish: A Lavish Banquet for Guys in Trouble!
3.SummaryEnglish: The secret of the Shogunate, the Coastal Atlas of Japan, has been stolen! It is up to the Helper to get it back.

4.TitleEnglish: A Lavish Banquet in Skintight Swimsuits!
4.SummaryEnglish: Ten million ry≈ç... that is the Helper's share if the help the monkey face lord retrieve his family's hidden treasure. That much money is always followed by a string of headaches.

5.TitleEnglish: Shred and Throw for a Lavish Banquet!
5.SummaryEnglish: Roman's secret identity has been found and challenged for the title of "Second Generation Nezumi Kozo" by Red!

6.TitleEnglish: Alleys, Cellars and a Lavish Banquet!
6.SummaryEnglish: Roman's one true love has been kidnapped by a pervert. He has been asked by Orin to find her, and so has Magoichi, who has received some bad information.

7.TitleEnglish: There's a Lot to Life and a Lavish Banquet!
7.SummaryEnglish: The helpers have been asked in secret by the Mito, Owari, and Kishu domains to find the thieves to continually steal from them. The task leads Roman to a military group, and the worst secret he could ever learn.

8.TitleEnglish: What a Terrible Face, and a Lavish Banquet!
8.SummaryEnglish: Roman is broken and spends his days drinking; a man from his past attempts to snap him out of his rut. Meanwhile, Magoichi might have found what he was looking for...

9.TitleEnglish: Bang Bang Ba-Bang! It's a Lavish Banquet!
9.SummaryEnglish: Koharu is kidnapped! Roman and his friends are determine to rescue her.

10.TitleEnglish: Show Your True Intentions with a Lavish Banquet!
10.SummaryEnglish: After capturing Koharu, Otsu is shot and thrown off Admiral Perry's Ironclad. Roman and his friend managed to save her life. She reveals her tragic life story to Roman, while everyone prepares resecue Koharu.

11.TitleEnglish: A Showdown you wont Believe, and a Lavish Banquet!
11.SummaryEnglish: Roman and his friends using one of the old man's inventions, rush quickly to Perry's high-tech Ironclad Shining Dawn. The team boards the ship underfire, while Roman proceeds to try find his sister, Koharu. Roman soon discovers, Koharu has been brained washed as part of Perry's plan to take over Japan.

12.TitleEnglish: In Full Bloom! A Lavish Banquet of Smiles!
12.SummaryEnglish: Roman and his friends fight on the burning decks of the Shining Dawn, however "Admiral" Perry has the brainwashed Koharu fires the ship's main gun and devastates Edo. The gang cripples the ship and while Roman confronts Perry in a final battle.
